db:abstract.db:para: Scans .qml files and imports required QML static plugins.

db:section.db:title: Description
db:section.db:para: Runs qmlimportscanner at configure time to find the static QML plugins used and links them to the given target.

db:note.db:para: When used with a non-static Qt build, this function does nothing.

db:section.db:para: This CMake command was introduced in Qt 5.14.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt5 COMPONENTS Quick QmlImportScanner) add_executable(myapp main.cpp) target_link_libraries(myapp Qt5::Quick) qt5_import_qml_plugins(myapp)
